LanguageData.TD.RestrictBest: Restrict mining with yield to best miners
LanguageData.TD.RestrictBestDesc: Because low skilled miners will not produce as much. Yield increases until skill 8, but bad health can affect it. Check their Mining Yield in their stats window.
LanguageData.TD.SettingIgnoreBusy: Ignore best miners that are busy with another job
LanguageData.TD.SettingIgnoreBusyDesc: Checks if your best miner is busy with other work, and allows the next best skilled miners to mine
LanguageData.TD.SettingMinerGoodEnough: Include miners that are good enough
LanguageData.TD.SettingMinerGoodEnoughDesc: For example, if your best miner has 80% yield, a setting of 75% would allow a miner with 60% yield.
LanguageData.TD.SettingFinishUpDrills: Prefer deep drills that are nearer to exhaustion
